00008 void ConfigurationWriter::startNewLine(unsigned int depth, DataOutputStream* outputStream)
00009 {
00010     FilesystemUtils::writeLineToStream(outputStream, "\n");
00011 
00012     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < depth; i++)
00013         FilesystemUtils::writeLineToStream(outputStream, "\n");
00014 
00015 }
00016 
00017 void ConfigurationWriter::outputNode(ConfigurationNode* Node, unsigned int depth, DataOutputStream* outStrm)
00018 {
00019     char lineBuffer[1024];
00020 
00021     if (Node->getType() == configurationFolder)
00022     {
00023 
00024         //Start the writer with a newline at the correct depth (Or at least the specified depth)
00025         startNewLine(depth,outStrm);
00026 
00027         //Create the line folder "NAME" { and write it to the file
00028         sprintf(lineBuffer, "folder \"%s\" {", Node->getName());
00029         FilesystemUtils::writeLineToStream(outStrm, lineBuffer);
00030 
00031         //Loop through each child and write them in as children
00032         ConfigurationFolder* folder = static_cast<ConfigurationFolder*> (Node);
00033 
00034         //Get the number of children
00035         unsigned int folderLength = folder->numberOfChildren();
00036 
00037         //Loop through each node
00038         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < folderLength; i++)
00039         {
00040             //Output each node with a depth value of +1 (To make the file format nicely for the possible human reader)
00041             outputNode(folder->getChild(i), depth + 1, outStrm);
00042         }
00043 
00044         //Start a new line
00045         startNewLine(depth, outStrm);
00046 
00047         //Output the } to signify the end of the folder in the file
00048         FilesystemUtils::writeLineToStream(outStrm, "}");
00049 
00050     }
00051     else if (Node->getType() == configurationString)
00052     {
00053 
00054         //Start a new line
00055         startNewLine(depth, outStrm);
00056 
00057         //Get a pointer to a ConfigurationString* node by typecasting the node given
00058         ConfigurationString* string = static_cast<ConfigurationString*> (Node);
00059 
00060         //Write the string line using fprintf
00061         sprintf(lineBuffer, "string \"%s\" = \"%s\";", Node->getName(), string->getStringData());
00062         FilesystemUtils::writeLineToStream(outStrm, lineBuffer);
00063 
00064 
00065     }
00066     else if (Node->getType() == configurationNumber)
00067     {
00068 
00069         //Start a new line
00070         startNewLine(depth, outStrm);
00071 
00072         //Get a pointer to a ConfigurationNumber* node by typecasting the node given
00073         ConfigurationNumber* Number = static_cast<ConfigurationNumber*> (Node);
00074 
00075         //Write the number line using fprintf
00076         sprintf(lineBuffer, "number \"%s\" = %f;", Node->getName(), Number->getValue());
00077         FilesystemUtils::writeLineToStream(outStrm, lineBuffer);
00078 
00079     }
00080     else
00081     {
00082         //If the node isn't handled bitch a bit
00083 
00084         printf("NODE CANNOT BE WRITTEN (Yet)\n");
00085     }
00086 
00087 }
